messages.title: Local Transport
messages.content: JANET BRAGG is a firm believer in public transport. Janet says: 'As a regular user of bus transport I can say that the buses need to be more reliable and much less expensive, more comfortable and accessible for all.' Janet has campaigned successfully for improvements to local services in our area.

messages.title: Working with local people
messages.content: Janet Bragg holds regular surgeries, keeps in touch with local schools, and is a proactive and valued member of the local community.

messages.title: LABOUR's NATIONAL PLEDGES
messages.content: One-to-one tuition for kids who are falling behind in basics. A points-based system to control immigration. 1 million new skilled jobs and a rising Minimum Wage. Dignity in old age with a National Care Service. Protect the Post Office with a People's Bank.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour pledges one-to-one tuition for kids falling behind in basics.
Labour supports a points-based system to control immigration.
Labour promises 1 million new skilled jobs and a rising Minimum Wage.
Labour's plan includes a National Care Service for dignity in old age.
Labour aims to protect the Post Office with a People's Bank.

mentions.candidate: Janet Bragg has campaigned successfully for improvements to local services in our area.
mentions.partyLeader: David Blunkett's pledge to you is to put your voice first.

issues.immigration: A points-based system to control immigration.
issues.socialWelfare: Dignity in old age with a National Care Service.

leaflet.personalStatement: David Blunkett's pledge to you is to put your voice first. My task is to work for you, locally and nationally.

quotes.text: We want to work together, with you, for a better future.

images.caption: Janet Bragg campaigning with local residents
